name: Mira's Tale VR
description:
Mira's Tale is a story driven puzzle game where you play as a Witch who lost her friend. You will have to use her trusty wand to draw simbols in the air to cast various spells and defeat enemies.   
Each year Mira's friend Mori (The grim reaper) comes to visit her, but this year is diffrent. You follow Mira as she tries to find him. Some souls, who hanen't gotten their deserved rest,  still haunt the world. 

This game is only for the Oculus rift and rift S.
